description: Brave the elements this season in the perfect rain jacket. The Palisades Rain Jacket is made with their recycled performance woven ripstop fabric that has three-layer waterproof protection, a mid-length silhouette, a shaped hood with drawstring and plenty of subtle but strong construction details to keep you dry and covered along every commute. Great for traveling, hiking, camping and chilling.
name: Vuori Palisades Rain Jacket - Mens
